name: marisko-skills
description: Personal skill marketplace for AI-assisted development

plugins.name: skill-forge
plugins.description: Unified skill lifecycle: creation, improvement, auditing. Includes skill-reviewer agent and /forge, /skills-inventory commands.

plugins.name: dev-worktree
plugins.description: Git worktree lifecycle for Docker backends and frontend projects: readiness assessment, environment isolation, port allocation, shared Docker mode, smart teardown, warm standby, similar worktree detection, main Docker protection, backend URL discovery, backlog integration.

plugins.name: pm-core
plugins.description: Project management meta-tool: analyzes projects and generates customized dev-skills, agents, commands, and quality gates
